title: Whistleblower describes 'chaos' of UK Afghan exit
content: Thousands of pleas for help went unread and the foreign secretary lacked urgency, an ex-official says.

title: Labour MP Harman to stand down at next election
content: The veteran MP announces her impending exit from the Commons after almost 40 years in the job.

title: Sex-based hostility should be hate speech - report
content: But the Law Commission is criticised for its proposals for legal reforms to tackle misogyny.

title: Black minister often mistaken for restaurant staff
content: Vaughan Gething says he would not be asked that question if he was smartly-dressed white man.

title: Drug targets for prisons in England and Wales
content: Under new plans, each jail will be given a target on the number of drug tests that must be carried out.

title: Amnesty proposals 'go too far' - ex-defence minister
content: Troubles-related prosecution plans are "cutting off pathways to justice", says Johnny Mercer.

title: Omicron spreading in the community, Javid confirms
content: The new variant is spreading in multiple regions of England, the health secretary says.
